name: Real Cars Extreme Racing
description:
There are 30 supercars, 180 racetracks, 2 player mode, 1 free driving mode, Hot Chase mode, Battlefield mode, and Policeman mode. There is a vehicle purchase and development system in the game. You can race against Artificial Intelligence, drive freely in free-ride mode, and blow up your opponents in battle arena mode, causing fear to your opponents.

Game modes Career

There are many areas where you can test yourself in career mode. These areas are "Race", "Against Time", "Stunt", "Checkpoint" and "Fly Parkour" respectively. When the race is completed, you receive stars according to the completion degree You can get a maximum of 540 stars in career mode.

There are 36 racetracks in "Race" mode. You race with 7 Artificial Intelligence and if you can enter the top 3 when the race is over, you have the right to move on to the next race track. When the race is over, you earn money according to the time you complete the race. In addition, the drift points, damage points and flight points you earn in the race will also earn you money.

In "Time Against" mode, you race against time. There are 36 racetracks in total. When you reach the finish line, you rate it based on when you reached it. Get star ratings here. With these star ratings, you can buy new and supercars.

In "Stunt" mode, you need to reach the finish line by performing stunts on 36 specially designed racetracks. Reaching the finish line in time by staying on the track on challenging race tracks takes skill.

In "Checkpoint" mode, you need to try to reach the finish line by overcoming obstacles on 12 specially designed racetracks.

Get ready to fly in "Fly Parkour" mode. Will you be able to reach the finish line without getting off the road?You can get new vehicles with the stars you earn in the "Career" section. In addition, with the money you earn, you can buy new vehicles and increase engine power.

Free Driving

Get ready for free rides in a big city. The free mode area contains large buildings, wide streets, stunt areas, and many mysterious areas. There are 60 gems hidden in the city. By collecting these gems, you can have new vehicles. The "Reward" table opens every 300 (5 minutes) seconds. In this "Reward" table, you earn money based on your drift, damage, and flight points. If you wait 300 seconds, you can get good rewards. When the number of keys reaches a certain level, the vehicle is opened for automatic use.

Hot Chase

Police are chasing vehicles and want to catch you? Ready for this action-packed chase? In this mode, we have the "HP" value. Damages we take while fleeing from the cops decrease our "HP" value. So try to stay away from the cops. Be careful, the cops are always after you. When your "HP" value is 0, you will be caught. The cops arrest you.

Battle Arena

Get ready for an action-packed battlefield. A total of 8 racers showcase their skills on the specially designed battlefield. There are 3 special abilities: "Damage X5", "HP +25", "SHIELD". By collecting these skills, you can beat your opponents.

The last man standing wins. This mode is a mode in which vehicles try to crash and explode. The vehicle explodes when its HP drops to 0. The opponent with 0 HP will withdraw from the battle. Your HP + 20 increases when you detonate another. There are ranking rewards at the end of the battle. You must be in the top 3 to receive these ranking rewards. Let's get on the battlefield and roar like a lion.

Mr. Policeman

As a police officer, you have been assigned to catch criminals. Your time is limited and the criminals run away from you. Can you catch the criminals before time runs out? Criminals will appear in waves and you need to hit them, reducing their 'HP' to 0.

Two Players (2P VERSUS)

You can race with your friends on the same computer with half screen. There are 12 special race tracks. Prove who is the better driver.
